Some affected individuals have less severe symptoms that begin later in childhood or in adulthood. In the mildest forms of glutaric acidemia type II, muscle weakness developing in adulthood may be the first sign of the disorder.",GHR,glutaric acidemia type II
How many people are affected by glutaric acidemia type II ?,Glutaric acidemia type II is a very rare disorder; its precise incidence is unknown. It has been reported in several different ethnic groups.,GHR,glutaric acidemia type II
